Package org.eclipse.papyrus.designer.languages.common.base

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ILocationStrategy
    A location strategy defines the location of a file associated with a model element depending on the namespaces of this model element (package hierarchy).
    IPFileSystemAccess
    Simple interface inspired from IFileSystemAccess in xtext.generator.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Activator
    The activator class controls the plug-in life cycle
    GenUtils
    Some utilities: a set of static methods for Acceleo based code generation
    HierarchyLocationStrategy  
    JavaIoFileSystemAccess
    A simple class providing access to the file system, if the project is known
    Messages  
    ModelElementsCreator
    Main class of code generator.
    ProjectBasedFileAccess
    A simple class providing access to the file system, if the project is known
